quizitems.questiontext: Which Australian was selected by the Milwaukee Bucks with the first overall pick in the 2005 National Basketball Association (NBA) Draft?
With 15,921 runs, which international cricketer holds the record for the most Test runs?
How many players have won 3 Brownlow medal awards, the highest individual honour in Australian Rules football?
At 9.58 seconds, Usain Bolt holds the record for the fastest time in the 100 metre sprint, but which sprinter holds the female record with 10.49 seconds?
U.S Baseball star, Babe Ruth played for the Boston Red Sox, New York Yankees and which other baseball team?
Which nation won Gold in women’s hockey at the 2012 London Olympics?
Which golfer won the 2013 Masters Tournament in Augusta, Georgia?
Which 2 male tennis players have the most Wimbledon singles titles, seven each?
Retired Australian thoroughbred racehorse, Black Caviar, was undefeated in how many races?
Which English Premier League football club supporters traditionally sing the song ‘You'll Never Walk Alone’ before commencement of the match?
